General.Name: Huikwang
General.Description: Huikwang Corporation engages in the manufacture, processing, packaging, and trading of various pesticides, fertilizers, and public health pesticides in Taiwan. It is also involved in the manufacture of plastic sheets, fabrics, pipes, tubes, plastic films, bags, geosynthesis, and industrial plastic products. The company also exports its products. Huikwang Corporation was founded in 1954 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 259, Majia Road, Tainan City, Taiwan
